channel.title: Player not remove equippment
channel.description: Ok so What I am trying to do is making a player not be able to un equip his equipment, Like for example the castle wars cape, how they cannot remove it. I have a Pi source atm, And I've posted help here before about this same thing also I've searched multiple sites and multiple search engines so please help.

item.title: Player not remove equippment

item.description:
@yo_dude_1345 wrote:

Ok so What I am trying to do is making a player not be able to un equip his equipment, Like for example the castle wars cape, how they cannot remove it.
I have a Pi source atm, And I’ve posted help here before about this same thing also I’ve searched multiple sites and multiple search engines so please help.
